name: Fear the Lights Out - DEMO
description:
Do you remember the movie, "Lights out". Do you remember the fear you felt when you watched it? This virtual reality Oculus Quest game is based on similar things like that movie. Just keep the lights on and you won't have any problem :)

This will be a very scary horror game when it will be ready. :) This DEMO ends when you collect the first key in the corridor.

The game will launch in Q2, 2021 for Oculus Quest / Side quest. You can download the Alpha Demo on Side Quest.

I started to work on this game since a while and this is my first alpha demo. 

I hope you will like it :) If you would like to support the development, you can donate here.

If you have any suggestion, then let me know :)

Thank you very much!

How To Install

Please Install from SideQuest : https://sidequestvr.com/

Alternatively, you can download the APK from this page and Check this guide if you need help on how to do it!
